description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using Adam Wood. Features a lion figurehead, soldier dock system, and Cola-powered propulsion.

keyMoments.title: Departs Punk Hazard for Dressrosa
keyMoments.description: The Thousand Sunny carries the Straw Hats, Law, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke away from Punk Hazard toward Dressrosa.
keyMoments.significance: Begins the journey to the next major arc location.

keyMoments.title: Navigates Sea Slope
keyMoments.description: Successfully navigates a dangerous sea slope in the New World under Nami's guidance.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ship's durability and the crew's navigation skills in the treacherous New World.
